title: Nile: river of the gods
brief_description: The Nile has been a source of life for human civilisation for over 3,000 years. This program journeys up the Nile, exploring both its past and present. The Nile is synonymous to the great civilisation which was Ancient Egypt, and the program looks at the ancient sites and monuments which have constantly attracted visitors. Highlights the wildlife of the Nile in all its variety and the activities of the people who have dwelt along the river banks.
